trans-unit.source: Represents an item in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et element i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A DataListItem object represents an item in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control, such as a heading section, a footer section, or a data item.
trans-unit.target: Et DataListItem-objekt som representerer et element i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>kontroll, for eksempel en overskrift-delen, en bunntekstdel eller et dataelement.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: The data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are stored in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemCollection> that can be accessed by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: Dataene elementer i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>kontrollen er lagret i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemCollection>som kan nås ved hjelp av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: You can use a DataListItem to programmatically access the properties of an item in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke en DataListItem programmatisk tilgang egenskaper for et element i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å opprette og starte en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>

trans-unit.source: The index of the item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items*> collection.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for elementet i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"> </xref> kontrollere fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items*>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"></xref> control, which contains the style properties for the control.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objekt den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"> </xref> kontroll, som inneholder stilegenskaper for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This method is primarily used by control developers, when extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere når utvide funksjonaliteten til de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that contains the style properties of the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som inneholder stilegenskaper for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a data item associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et dataelement som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"> </xref> objekt i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataItem property to specify or determine the properties of a data item associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk DataItem-egenskapen til å angi eller finne ut hvilke egenskaper på et dataelement som er knyttet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>objekt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property only applies to data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne egenskapen gjelder bare for dataelementer i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.ItemType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> object must be set to one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.ItemType%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>objektet må være satt til en av de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType>nummereringsverdier.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.ItemType%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that represents a data item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> som representerer et dataelement i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"></xref> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items*> collection of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter indeksen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"> </xref> objektet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items*>samlingen kontrollens.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items*>

trans-unit.source: Use the ItemIndex property to determine the index number of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen ItemIndex indeksen antall den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>objektet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property only applies to data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne egenskapen gjelder bare for dataelementer i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.ItemType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> object must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.ItemType%2A>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>objektet må være satt til `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, eller `ListItemType.EditItem`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.ItemType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"></xref> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items*> collection.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"> </xref> objektet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items*>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the item represented by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter elementtypen representert av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"> </xref> objekt i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the ItemType property to determine the type of the item represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ItemType-egenskapen for å finne ut hvilken type element som er representert av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the various item types.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser ulike elementtyper.

trans-unit.source: |Item Type|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Header`|The heading section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.| |`Footer`|The footer section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.| |`Item`|An item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.| |`AlternatingItem`|An alternating item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.| |`SelectedItem`|The selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.| |`EditItem`|The item selected for editing in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.| |`Separator`|A separator between the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.| |`Pager`|The page selection section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.|
trans-unit.target: | Elementtype | Beskrivelse | |---------------|-----------------| | `Header`| Delen overskriften kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>. | | `Footer`| Bunnteksten kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>. | | `Item`| Et element i kontrollen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>. | | `AlternatingItem`| Et vekslende element i kontrollen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>. | | `SelectedItem`| Det valgte elementet i kontrollen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>. | | `EditItem`| Elementet som er valgt for redigering <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>kontrollens. | | `Separator`| Et skilletegn mellom elementer kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>. | | `Pager`| Delen siden valg av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>kontroll. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the event for the control is passed up the server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om hendelsen for kontrollen som er sendt server kontrollen hierarkiet.

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers when extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere når utvide funksjonaliteten til de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: Kilden for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>objekt som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis hendelsen ble avbrutt; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Displays the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"></xref> object on the client.
trans-unit.target: Viser den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"> </xref> objekt på klienten.

trans-unit.source: Use the RenderItem method to display the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> object on the client.
trans-unit.target: Bruk RenderItem-metoden til å vise den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>objekt på klienten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object that contains the output stream for rendering on the client.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objekt som inneholder utdata dataflyten for gjengivelse på klienten.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to extract rows; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til å trekke ut rader. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display as a table; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>skal vises som en tabell. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.ItemType*> property for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Angir gjeldende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.ItemType*>-egenskapen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.ItemType*>

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers when extending the functionality of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere når utvide funksjonaliteten til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the <xref uid="langword_csharp_disabled" name="disabled" href=""></xref> attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om kontrollen skal angi den <xref uid="langword_csharp_disabled" name="disabled" href=""> </xref> attributtet i det gjengitte HTML-elementet til "deaktivert" når kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled*>

trans-unit.source: This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen angir hvordan ASP.NET skal gjengi HTML for en kontroll når kontrollen er deaktivert.

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen er `true`, ASP.NET gjengir en `disabled` attributt når en kontroll er deaktivert.

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen er `false`, ASP.NET gjengir en `class` attributt når en kontroll er deaktivert.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than `4.0`; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen angir en ASP.NET-versjonen som er lavere enn `4.0`; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: En beskrivelse for dette medlemmet under <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.DataItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to retrieve the data object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> object.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis, bør du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.DataItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å hente data-objekt for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.DataItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The IDataItemContainer.DataItem member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Medlemmet IDataItemContainer.DataItem er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the value to use when data-binding operations are performed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer verdien som skal brukes når databinding operasjoner er utført.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItemIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: En beskrivelse for dette medlemmet under <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItemIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.ItemIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to retrieve the data-item index for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> object.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis, bør du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.ItemIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å hente dataelement indeksen for et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.ItemIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The IDataItemContainer.DataItemIndex member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Medlemmet IDataItemContainer.DataItemIndex er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the index of the data item bound to a control.
trans-unit.target: Et heltall som representerer indeksen for dataelementet bundet til en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DisplayIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: En beskrivelse for dette medlemmet under <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DisplayIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.ItemIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to retrieve the data-item index for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> object.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis, bør du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.ItemIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å hente dataelement indeksen for et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.ItemIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The IDataItemContainer.DisplayIndex member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Medlemmet IDataItemContainer.DisplayIndex er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the position of the data item as displayed in a control.
trans-unit.target: Et heltall som representerer posisjonen for dataelementet som vises i en kontroll.
